release.description: Official release featuring Field Tools, cross-platform color token system, measurement tools, and CI/CD pipeline

features.description: Enhanced color token system with WCAG AA compliance verification and additional semantic colors
Implemented bubble-level/inclinometer functionality using Android SensorManager and iOS CoreMotion
Added complete AR-based measurement capabilities for both platforms
Added LiDAR RoomPlan integration for iOS devices

enhancements.description: Enabled Git LFS tracking for snapshot baseline files and USDZ assets
Updated GitHub Actions workflows with improved configurations and artifact management
Added comprehensive documentation for build pipeline and project plan
Added required iOS permissions for camera and photo library access
